sentence: Republican Senate hopeful Herschel Walker indicated recently that he would avoid debates against his GOP rivals and instead focus on Democratic U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Lawmakers rush to finish favorite bills before time runs out

sentence: Former NFL player Herschel Walker, who is running for Senate in Georgia, where Gingrich used to be a congressman, was one GOP candidate he highlighted.
author: Daniel Chaitin
title: Newt Gingrich predicts GOP could pick up historic 70 House seats

sentence: The only other Georgia candidate who has Haleys backing is Herschel Walker, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: Nikki Haley endorses 2nd District GOP candidate Jeremy Hunt
